attributes.action: resolve the expenses scandal and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the wake of the publication of MPs expenses, parliamentarians need to submit themselves for re-election. This parliament cannot resolve the issue. Only a new parliament will have public confidence to do so. Once all the details are in the public arena the Prime Minister should dissolve parliament so that the next Parliament has the democratic legitimacy and confidence to resolve the matter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
